name: The Apothecary (Charlamaine Ly)
description:
Welcome to The Apothecary!

We’re glad you’re here, but you probably aren’t

The Apothecary is an interactive animated adventure where you can follow the story of the staff in this wacky medieval hospital. Immerse in the story not only through the animation, but also with minigames where you can perform the medical procedures happening on-screen!

Our patients’ lives are in your hands! 

The Story

What happens when an apothecary (that doubles as a secret laboratory for magical research) employs a cast of misfit healers who wreak havoc and medical liability everywhere they go and a director who is appointed to clean up their mess? 

What's in store for you at The Apothecary:
  • A 10-minute-ish fully animated episode with branching narrative 
  • 4 totally  different endings (collect them all!)
  • 7 flash-inspired minigames (bringing back that nostalgia)
  • Endless replayability and stress-relief (or stress-inducing) enjoyment~
Thank you!

This project is the product of my Digital Media Major Project Course at RMIT University Vietnam. Thank you to my awesome lecturers, friends and family who were willing to voice the characters and provided emotional support during the exhaustive and seemingly never-ending days of animating and coding this project.

And a huge thank you to my advisor Ricardo for all the advise, encouragement (and sarcastic remarks), and for always making the effort to be there in every stage of this project. 

Finally, thank you - my dear viewer - for taking an interest in this project and I hope you enjoy this episode of The Apothecary! Feel free to leave comments or reach out. I would love to hear you thoughts!
